parameters.y: log real GDP (in billions of 1987 dollars)
parameters.infl: quarterly inflation rate (change in log prices), % per year
parameters.m: log of real M1 money stock

reference: Hoffman, D.L.  and  R.H.  Rasche (1996) “Assessing forecast performance in a cointegrated system”, Journal of Applied Econometrics, 11, 495–517.
title: Macroeconomic Series for the United States
description:
Description
quarterly observations from 1954–01 to 1994–12
number of observations :  164
country :  United States
